item.title: Slim Decafe Java
item.description: I've built up a small collection of simple containered web apps in a number of languages/frameworks over the last couple of years which I use for my demos. I use these especially with Azure and with Kubernetes, when I need “something” to deploy and run I was in the process of moving these all over to Kubernetes (deployed though Helm and GitHub Actions) when I took a look at them all running side by side.
